content: Can you solve the puzzle of the iPhone 11 Pro's features and specifications? Use the information provided below to complete the table accurately. Display: _____________________ Processor: _____________________ Cameras: _____________________ Storage: _____________________ Water resistance: _____________________ Operating system: _____________________ The iPhone 11 Pro is the latest Apple smartphone, boasting a powerful A13 Bionic chip and a triple-camera system. It has a stunning OLED display that delivers true-to-life colors and an immersive viewing experience. Additionally, it is water and dust resistant, rated IP68. The triple-camera system includes three 12MP cameras that work together seamlessly to deliver stunning photos and videos, along with a night mode feature that automatically turns on in low-light situations. The phone is available with 64GB, 256GB, or 512GB of storage and operates on iOS 13. Can you fill in the blanks and complete the puzzle?

Certainly! Here is the completed table for the iPhone 11 Pro's features and specifications: Display: OLED display Processor: A13 Bionic chip Cameras: Triple-camera system with three 12MP cameras Storage: Available in 64GB, 256GB, or 512GB Water resistance: Rated IP68 Operating system: iOS 13
